Package com.lopl.melody.slash

Class SlashCommandClient

java.lang.Object
net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
com.lopl.melody.slash.SlashCommandClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.EventListener
public class SlashCommandClient
extends net.dv8tion.jda.api.hooks.ListenerAdapter
Manager class for all SlashCommands, Buttons and SelectionMenus. An instance can be built with the SlashCommandClientBuilder. The class implements the Singleton design pattern in some way. Meaning, that once a instance is created you can retrieve this instance with getInstance().

    • getCommandByKeyword

      public SlashCommand getCommandByKeyword​(java.lang.String keyword)
      This returns a SlashCommand for a given keyword. If the keyword matches any of the SlashCommand names, the first one is returned
      Parameters:
      keyword - a SlashCommand.name
      Returns:
      the belonging SlashCommand

    • getCommandByButton

      public SlashCommand getCommandByButton​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.interactions.components.Button button)
      This returns a SlashCommand for a registered button. If the keyword matches any of the buttons in the buttonManager, the first one is returned You have to use SlashCommand.registerButton(Button) with the button before.
      Parameters:
      button - a registered Button
      Returns:
      the belonging SlashCommand

    • getCommandByDropdown

      public SlashCommand getCommandByDropdown​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.interactions.components.selections.SelectionMenu selectionMenu)
      This returns a SlashCommand for a registered dropdown. If the keyword matches any of the dropdowns in the dropdownManager, the first one is returned You have to use SlashCommand.registerDropdown(SelectionMenu) with the selectionMenu before.
      Parameters:
      selectionMenu - a registered SelectionMenu
      Returns:
      the belonging SlashCommand

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws javax.security.auth.login.LoginException, java.lang.InterruptedException
      Execute this method to reload all commands and their arguments. This method will upsert every guild after another. This takes some time to finish, depending on how many guilds the bot is in. You could upsert the commands globally, but this can take up to 24 hours till discord manages the request. All following methods work recursive with finished callbacks to avoid await statements.
      Parameters:
      args - should be an empty array
      Throws:
      javax.security.auth.login.LoginException - if the discord api is not available
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if the user cancels the program or the manager doesn't finish

    • upsertAllGuildsCommands
